notes:
The draft was sent for IETF Last Call in January 2000 [1], so there was clearly an IETF consensus process, and RFC 2026 makes it clear that BCPs are IETF community documents [2]. The fact that the IAB created the document [3] is beside the point.

[1] https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/msg/ietf-announce-old/B7yoX03qpnS157ERkRE1taiHwTk/
[2] https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc2026.html#section-5
[3] https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/msg/ietf-announce-old/dyt3ERlzLjaYi-P7WycSIyhCHL8/
